Uses of Class
whitecat.core.role.descriptors.EventDescriptor

Packages that use EventDescriptor
whitecat.core.role.descriptors   
 

Uses of EventDescriptor in whitecat.core.role.descriptors
 

Fields in whitecat.core.role.descriptors with type parameters of type EventDescriptor
private  java.util.List<EventDescriptor> OperationDescriptor.eventDescriptors
          A list of events that are tied to this operation (e.g., events that are sent or received after executing the operation tied to this descriptor).
private  java.util.List<EventDescriptor> RoleDescriptor.eventDscriptors
          A list of events untied from a particular operation of this role.
 

Methods in whitecat.core.role.descriptors that return EventDescriptor
static EventDescriptor EventDescriptor.getInstance(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String aim, boolean issuing, boolean receiving)
          Builds up an event descriptor instance with the specified properties.
 

Methods in whitecat.core.role.descriptors that return types with arguments of type EventDescriptor
 java.util.List<EventDescriptor> RoleDescriptor.getAllEventDescriptors()
          Provides all the event descriptors contained in this role descriptor, that is the descriptors tied to the role itself as well as the event descriptors tied to each single operation.
 java.util.List<EventDescriptor> OperationDescriptor.getEventDescriptors()
          This method can be used to set the value of the eventDescriptors field, providing thus read access to the eventDescriptors property.
 java.util.List<EventDescriptor> RoleDescriptor.getEventDscriptors()
          This method can be used to set the value of the eventDscriptors field, providing thus read access to the eventDscriptors property.
 

Methods in whitecat.core.role.descriptors with parameters of type EventDescriptor
protected  boolean OperationDescriptor.addEventDescriptor(EventDescriptor toAdd)
          Adds the specified event descriptor at the descriptor list.
protected  boolean OperationDescriptor.removeEventDescriptor(EventDescriptor toRemove)
          Removes the specified event descriptor from the list of descriptors.
 

Method parameters in whitecat.core.role.descriptors with type arguments of type EventDescriptor
static RoleDescriptor RoleDescriptor.getInstance(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String aim, java.util.List<OperationDescriptor> operations, java.util.List<EventDescriptor> events, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keywords)
          Factory method to create a role descriptor.
protected  void OperationDescriptor.setEventDescriptors(java.util.List<EventDescriptor> eventDescriptors)
          This method can be used to set the value of the eventDescriptors field, providing thus write access to the eventDescriptors property.
protected  void RoleDescriptor.setEventDscriptors(java.util.List<EventDescriptor> eventDscriptors)
          This method can be used to set the value of the eventDscriptors field, providing thus write access to the eventDscriptors property.
